meanings.definition: In the seventh place or order.
meanings.sent1: Seventhly, we will discuss the final point in our presentation.
meanings.sent2: The team member presented seventhly, following the set agenda.
meanings.sent3: The cat, seventhly, decided to nap in the sunniest spot in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room, seventhly brightening everyone's mood.
meanings.sent5: Seventhly, the stars twinkled in the night sky, creating a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: As the seventh item in a list or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The seventhly item on the menu was the chef's special pasta dish.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the seventhly cup on the shelf, completing the set.
meanings.sent3: The seventhly balloon in the bunch popped, causing a surprise burst of confetti.
meanings.sent4: His seventhly attempt at solving the puzzle finally led to success.
meanings.sent5: The seventhly book on the shelf caught her eye with its colorful cover.
